document_data.mainbody: '''The Dancing Dryads''' was a rare phenomenon that occurred seeming at random and heralded great upheavals in [[Faerûn]].
document_data.Description: The Dancing Dryads was an aptly named event when a circle of hauntingly beautiful dancing, laughing, and leaping [[dryad]]s manifested themselves in Faerûn.
document_data.History: The Dancing Dryads were known to appear throughout the ages and each observer claimed that a period of great upheaval followed in the forest spirits' wake. In the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], The Dancing Dryads appeared in the great forest of [[Chondalwood]] in the [[Vilhon Reach]]. Their pirouettes were observed by the traveling [[bard]] named [[Aglaera Rivenshaun]] of [[Chondath]], [[Chessenta]], and [[Turmish]].
